info.description: cwb-cads: CWB-based API for Corpus-Assisted Discourse Studies
info.title: cwb-cads

get.summary: Get scored items of collocation analysis.

post.summary: Create new semantic map for collocation items or make sure there are coordinates for all items on an existing map.

put.summary: Set meta data of corpus from encoded s-attribute.

get.summary: Get frequencies of segmentation span annotations.
Get all subcorpora of a corpus.

put.summary: Create subcorpus from stored meta data.

get.summary: Get scored items of a keyword analysis.

post.summary: Create new semantic map for keyword items or make sure there are coordinates for all items on an existing map.

patch.summary: Patch constellation. Use for updating name, comment, or discoursemes.

get.summary: Get all descriptions of this constellation.

post.summary: Create description of constellation in corpus. Makes sure individual discourseme descriptions exist.

patch.summary: Patch constellation description: add discourseme description.

get.summary: Get pairwise association scores for discoursemes in constellation, based on s-attribute.
Get all collocation analyses of constellation description.

post.description: Create collocation analysis of constellation description.

put.summary: Get collocation analysis of constellation description; create if necessary.
Automatically associate discoursemes that occur in the top collocational profile with this constellation.

get.description: TODO also return ranks (to ease frontend pagination)?
get.summary: Get scored items and discourseme scores of constellation collocation analysis.

parameters.description: tokens outside of window will be marked "out of window" (also used for filtering)
parameters.name: window

parameters.description: tokens in s-att instances other than the one at match will be marked "out of window" (also used for filtering)
parameters.name: context_break

parameters.description: maximum number of tokens to display
parameters.name: extended_window

parameters.description: structural attribute to break extended context
parameters.name: extended_context_break

parameters.description: primary positional attribute
parameters.name: primary

parameters.description: secondary positional attribute
parameters.name: secondary

parameters.description: queries to highlight in (extended) context
parameters.name: highlight_query_ids

parameters.description: page size
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: page number
parameters.name: page_number

parameters.description: sort on alphabetical order of attribute (ascending / descending) or based on cpos (random / first / last)
parameters.name: sort_order

parameters.description: offset of token resp. to match (negative) or matchend (positive) to sort on
parameters.name: sort_by_offset

parameters.description: p-attribute to sort on
parameters.name: sort_by_p_att

parameters.description: s-attribute to sort on
parameters.name: sort_by_s_att

parameters.description: item that must match in context (defined by window & context_break & query.s)
parameters.name: filter_item

parameters.description: p-attribute to search filter-item on
parameters.name: filter_item_p_att

parameters.description: queries that must match in context (defined by window & context_break / query.s)
parameters.name: filter_query_ids

get.summary: Get concordance lines of constellation in corpus.
Get all keyword analyses featuring this constellation. (Not implemented.)

post.summary: Create keyword analysis for constellation description.

put.summary: Automatically associate discoursemes that occur in the top keyword profile with this constellation.

get.description:
TODO find the bug: why are there duplicated measures?!
TODO also return ranks (to ease frontend pagination)?
get.summary: Get scored items and discourseme scores of constellation keyword analysis.

patch.summary: Patch constellation description: remove discourseme description.

post.description: Will automatically create query (from provided items or template).
post.summary: Create description of discourseme in corpus.

patch.summary: Patch discourseme description: add item to description.

get.summary: Get items most similar to the ones in discourseme breakdown.

patch.summary: Patch discourseme description: remove item from description.

post.summary: Create new query in assisted mode.

get.summary: Get breakdown of query. Will create if it doesn't exist.
Get collocation of query. Will create if doesn't exist.

get.summary: Identify who is logged with token

Return a new token if the user has a refresh token
